titles: The lady's new-years gift, or, Advice to a daughter
author: Halifax, George Savile, Marquis of, 1633-1695.
publisher: Printed for Matt. Gillyflower and James Partridge,
notes: "Under these following heads viz. religion, husband, house and familiy, servants, behaviour and conversation, friendships, censure, vanity and affectation, pride, diversions, dancing."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
